data.name: BOBBIT VIRUS
data.text: Removes a vital part of your hard disk then re-attachs it. (But that part will never work again.)

data.name: OPRAH WINFREY VIRUS
data.text: Your 200MB hard drive suddenly shrinks to 80MB, and then slowly expands back to 200MB.

data.name: POLITICALLY CORRECT VIRUS
data.text: Refers to itself as an "electronic microorganism."
